titleStmt.title: A plaine and familiar exposition of the eighteenth, nineteenth, and twentieth chapters of the Prouerbs of Salomon / by Iohn Dod and Robert Cleaver.
titleStmt.author: Dod, John, 1549?-1645.
Cleaver, Robert, 1561 or 2-ca. 1625.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Roger Iackson, and are to be sold at his shop in Fleetestreete neere the Conduit,

notesStmt.note: Errors in paging: p. 39 and 48 misnumbered 55 and 84 respectively.
This item can be found at reels 1708:19 and 1572:7.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University. Library. and Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
"Creede app[arently]. pr[inted]. quires B-O, Stansby the rest"--STC.

place.placeName: his shop in Fleetestreete neere the Conduit
